name: koishi-plugin-multi-bot-controller
description: Multi-bot response controller - manages the response behavior of multiple bots in the same channel by automatically adjusting the assignee field in the channel table, supporting keyword and command-based filtering rules
author: MissPinkElf <xiaolan20020118@gmail.com>

description.zh: 多 Bot 响应控制器 - 通过自动调整 channel 表中的 assignee 字段管理多个 Bot 在同一频道中的响应行为，支持基于关键词和指令的过滤规则
description.en: Multi-bot response controller - manages the response behavior of multiple bots in the same channel by automatically adjusting the assignee field in the channel table, supporting keyword and command-based filtering rules
